channel.title: Terrorism on Ilm Fruits
channel.description: Recent content in Terrorism on Ilm Fruits

item.title: Israel Bombs Gaza Again
item.description: Israel is bombing Gaza. Again. In two days, there are 400 dead and 1400 injured. Hospitals overflowing, boycotts, blood, and dead bodies… The Prophet (صلى الله عليه و سلم) said the Muslim ummah is like one body–if one part hurts, the whole body feels it and responds. Do you feel the pain? There are countless websites, emails, etc. that speak about this. We’re not going to reiterate all the points. Read about it here.
